text: Ilf and Petrov Rode a Tram () is a 1972 Soviet comedy movie directed by Viktor Titov.Умер Виктор ТитовЕХАЛИ В ТРАМВАЕ ИЛЬФ И ПЕТРОВ It stars Innokenty Smoktunovsky, Vladimir Basov, and Svetlana Starikova. ==Actors== * Innokenty Smoktunovsky as tramway passenger * Vladimir Basov as tramway passenger * Svetlana Starikova as tramway passenger * Emmanuil Geller as tramway passenger * Nicholas Gorlov as tramway passenger * Elena Volsky as check-taker * Yevgeny Leonov as Vitaly Kapitulov * Nina Agapova as Vera, Kapitulov's wife * Nicholas Grabbe as chief editor of newspaper * Grigory Shpigel as employee of the newspaper * Olga Gobzeva as typewriter == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1972 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Viktor Titov
title: Ilf and Petrov Rode a Tram
